Package de.javasoft.plaf.synthetica

Interface Summary
AddonsXMLProvider Addons theme XML provider interface.
SyntheticaLogoRenderer A logo renderer has to implement this interface and return itself.
SyntheticaWindowShape This interface has to be implemented to provide a custom window shape.
 

Class Summary
GraphicsUtils Common graphic operations and enhancements.
Popup Popup used to support shadow for popus in heavyweight containers.
PopupFactory PopupFactory used to support shadows for heavyweight popups.
StyleFactory Synthetica's StyleFactory.
SyntheticaCheckBoxMenuItemUI Synthetica CheckBoxMenuItem UI.
SyntheticaComboBoxLayoutManager Replacement for the SynthComboBoxUI LayoutManager to modify the arrow button resize behavior.
SyntheticaDefaultBooleanTableCellRenderer A tableCellRenderer which renders boolean values as checkbox.
SyntheticaDefaultLookup Replaces SynthDefaultLookup to install missed defaults.
SyntheticaDefaultTableCellEditor Alternative default editor for tables to respect table cell insets settings.
SyntheticaDefaultTableCellEditor.CellFocusBorder Focus Border Class
SyntheticaDefaultTableCellEditor.NumberEditor Default Number Editor
SyntheticaDefaultTableCellRenderer Alternative DefaultTableCellRenderer which respects declared table cell insets (see SyntheticaBlackEye-Theme) and improved performance.
SyntheticaDefaultTreeCellRenderer Default tree cell renderer used for synthetica trees.
SyntheticaDesktopManager DesktopManager to improve dragging performance for JInternalFrames with translucent borders.
SyntheticaLookAndFeel Synthetica's base Look and Feel.
SyntheticaMenuItemUI Synthetica MenuItem UI.
SyntheticaMenuUI Synthetica Menu UI.
SyntheticaRadioButtonMenuItemUI Synthetica RadioButtonMenuItem UI.
SyntheticaRootPaneUI Synthetica RootPaneUI to support decorated windows.
SyntheticaScrollPaneCorner Default corner component for scrollpanes.
SyntheticaScrollPaneCorner.TableUpperTrailingCorner  
SyntheticaScrollPaneCorner.UIResource  
SyntheticaScrollPaneLayoutManager Scroll pane layout manager to control horizontal/vertical scrollbar position within scrollpane.
SyntheticaSpinnerLayoutManager Replacement for the SynthSpinnerUI LayoutManager.
SyntheticaStandardLookAndFeel Synthetica Standard Look and Feel.
SyntheticaState Extended state class which covers additional component states like non-editable (LOCKED).
SyntheticaTitledBorder Titled border - will be installed through UIManager.
SyntheticaTitlePane Synthetica TitlePane to support decorated windows.
TreeCollapsedIcon JTree icon wrapper used for collapsed nodes.
TreeExpandedIcon JTree icon wrapper used for expanded nodes.
 

Enum Summary
SyntheticaLookAndFeel.JVMCompatibilityMode  
SyntheticaState.State  
SyntheticaTitlePane.LayoutStyle
